snippet.title: Bloodlines 2 - Wish I Knew Sooner | Tips, Tricks, & Game Knowledge for New Players
snippet.description:
Just starting out in Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 ...or are you already well on your way to conquering Seattle? Well never fear, your friends at Legacy Gaming have tons of tricks to help you take on the lurking darkness and dominate the looming evil. We share our favorite gameplay tips and tricks that will help you understand the game and set you on the right path to surviving in The Chinese Room's new action-RPG Bloodlines 2.

0:00 Intro
0:28 Choosing Your Clan
2:36 Blood Resonance Events
4:39 Traversing Seattle
5:55 Quick XP Each Night
7:10 Telekinesis Secrets
8:59 The Key To Combat
11:01 Subscribe for more Bloodlines 2
